faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers about Lumyf.
faq.a1: Yes! The Free plan is 100% free and includes 1 workspace, up to 2 members, 100 transactions per month and 3 financial goals. Ideal to start organizing your family finances at no cost.
faq.a2: Each family creates a workspace and invites members by email. Everyone can record transactions, view reports and track goals. Information is synced in real time for all members.
faq.q3: Does Lumyf connect to my bank?
faq.a3: No. Lumyf has no connection, integration or link to your bank account. All transactions are entered manually by you and your family. We do not access, connect or import data from financial institutions.
faq.a4: Yes. We use encryption and secure authentication. Your financial data is protected and only people you invite will have access to the workspace.
faq.q5: Can I cancel my paid plan anytime?
faq.a5: Yes. You can cancel your Pro or Business subscription whenever you want. After cancellation, you keep access until the end of the paid period and then your workspace reverts to the Free plan.
faq.q6: How many people can use a workspace?
faq.a6: The Free plan allows up to 2 members. Pro up to 5. Business up to 20 members. All so the whole family can participate in financial management.
